mapper.select:
select
from ope_customer_inquiry opi left join ope_customer oc on opi.customer_id = oc.id and oc.dr = 0 left join ope_sale_scooter scooter on scooter.id = opi.product_id and scooter.dr = 0 left join ope_color opp on scooter.color_id = opp.id and opp.dr = 0 left join ope_specificat_type spe on scooter.specificat_id = spe.id and spe.dr = 0 left join ope_customer_inquiry_b ocib on opi.id = ocib.inquiry_id and ocib.dr = 0 where opi.dr = 0 and opi.id = #{id} limit 1

select DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m') as times ,count(created_time) as total from ope_customer_inquiry where dr = 0 and (DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{start}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m')) GROUP BY times

select DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as times ,count(created_time) as total from ope_customer_inquiry where dr = 0 and (DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(#{start}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY times

select DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %h') as times ,count(created_time) as total from ope_customer_inquiry where dr = 0 and (DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY times
